title: The One About Hotels
description:
This week on Sibling Rivalry, Bob catches us up on their toupée journey, Monét and Bob fight about the Apple Store, and we find out what hotels are the best and which ones are the absolute worst. Tune in to hear Bob and Monét's takes on hotel sex, Grindr hookups, and reducing your carbon footprint!
